1.text: Scrub the jewelry with baby shampoo and water for a gentle clean.

2.text: Brush the jewelry with lemon juice to break down the tarnish.
2.vid: /d/d0/Make Fake Jewelry Silver Again Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Rub toothpaste onto the jewelry to make it shine again.
3.vid: /1/15/Make Fake Jewelry Silver Again Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Put the jewelry in ketchup for 10 minutes to remove any tarnish.
4.vid: /4/47/Make Fake Jewelry Silver Again Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Wipe the jewelry with soapy water if it has fake gemstones.
5.vid: /b/b1/Make Fake Jewelry Silver Again Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Use metal polish to bring your jewelry back to its original shininess.
6.vid: /9/91/Make Fake Jewelry Silver Again Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Line a glass bowl with aluminum foil.
7.vid: /5/5b/Make Fake Jewelry Silver Again Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Mix a solution of warm water, baking soda, and table salt.
8.vid: /3/38/Make Fake Jewelry Silver Again Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Submerge your jewelry in the water for 10 minutes.

10.text: Scrub the jewelry with a soft toothbrush.

11.text: Rinse the jewelry and dry it with a soft towel.
11.vid: /7/79/Make Fake Jewelry Silver Again Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4
